1. Amazon’s new Alexa voice assistant will use Claude AI  The Verge
  2. Alexa's big AI upgrade could be powered by Claude – and that might give us truly smart speakers  TechRadar
  3. Amazon Alexa Is Getting Claude AI in October Revamp: Report  CNET
  4. Amazon launching paid-version of Alexa  CBS News
  5. After a decade of free Alexa, Amazon now wants you to pay  Yahoo Life
